title: Adaptive Web-Based Personalized Mathematics Leadership Training Program

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of elementary mathematical concepts and organizational management experience as an administrator
context.additional_context: Customized web-based learning environment reflecting personal learning styles and emotional motivation, designed for managers/leaders requiring mathematical decision-making skills

learning_goals: Learners can apply personalized math problem-solving strategies based on individual learning patterns on adaptive web platforms with 85% accuracy.
Learners can establish self-directed learning plans at least twice monthly using emotion-based learning feedback in mobile environments.
Learners can analyze mathematical decision-making cases within organizations and propose improvement strategies at least three times through project-based assessments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
